resources.string: The Jedi are key characters in the Star Wars epic, Peace Knights - members of the Jedi Order, adherents of the Bright Side of the Force. Jedi are able to direct the Force that gives im super powers. The main weapon of the Jedi is a lightsaber.

Mandalorean is an upcoming American television series in the space opera genre, which is an integral part of the Star Wars universe. The premiere of the series will take place on November 12, 2019 at the Disney + streaming service, which will begin work on the same day.

Anakin Skywalker, who was named Darth Vader in the ranks of the Order of the Sith, is the central character in the first 6 films of the Star Wars series. Also appears in the movie Rogue One. The Star Wars movie epic demonstrates his formation as a Jedi Knight, his transition to the Dark Side of the Force, and his final redemption.

Sith are fictional characters from the Star Wars universe, adepts of the dark side of the Force. The Sith are the implacable opponents of the Jedi, some of the Sith themselves were once the Jedi, until the dark side of the Force carried them away.
